name: @wunderwerk/ts-results
description: A typescript implementation of Rust's Result and Option objects.

scripts.core:build: pnpm run clean && tsup src/index.ts --dts --format esm,cjs --out-dir ./dist && tsup src/rxjs-operators/index.ts --external rxjs --dts --format esm,cjs --out-dir ./dist/rxjs-operators
scripts.version-package: turbo run core:build core:test core:typecheck && changeset version
scripts.publish-package: turbo run core:build core:test core:typecheck && changeset publish
